    • Constructor Detail

      • DigitalGPIO

        public DigitalGPIO(int pin,
           String direction)
            throws ExceptionInInitializerError,
                   IOException
        Define digital GPIO pin, number and direction ( input or output)
        Parameters:
        pin - pin number
        direction - DigitalGPIO.OUTPUT or DigitalGPIO.INPUT
        Throws:
        IOException
        ExceptionInInitializerError

      • DigitalGPIO

        public DigitalGPIO(int pin,
           String direction,
           boolean state)
            throws ExceptionInInitializerError,
                   IOException
        Define digital GPIO pin, number and direction ( input or output)
        Parameters:
        pin - pin number - PINXX
        direction - OUTPUT or INPUT
        state - HIGH-LOW , true-false, ON-OFF
        Throws:
        IOException
        ExceptionInInitializerError

      • pool

        public void pool(long time)
        Pool GPIO file modified, and write value use method isHigh() or isLow() for reading value
        Parameters:
        time - time in millis
        See Also:
        isHigh(), isLow()

      • setHIGH

        public boolean setHIGH()
        set GPIO high (ON). Use if direction is set to OUT.
        Returns:
        true if success
        See Also:
        setLOW()

      • setLOW

        public boolean setLOW()
        set GPIO low (OFF). Use if direction is set to OUT.
        Returns:
        true if success
        See Also:
        setHIGH()

      • digitalWrite

        public void digitalWrite(boolean state)
        Set GPIO state true or false. Use is direction is OUT
        Parameters:
        state - boolean
        See Also:
        setHIGH(), setLOW()

      • setTOGGLE

        public boolean setTOGGLE()
                  throws IOException
        TOGGLE digital GPIO value. Use if direction is set to OUT
        Returns:
        integer value of pin (0 or 1)
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        setHIGH(), setLOW()

      • isHigh

        public boolean isHigh()
               throws IOException
        Check if value is HIGH. Use if direction is set to IN.
        Returns:
        TRUE if input is HIGH, and FALSE if input is LOW
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isLow

        public boolean isLow()
              throws IOException
        Check if value is LOW. Use if direction is set to IN.
        Returns:
        TRUE if input is LOW, and FALSE if input is HIGH
        Throws:
        IOException
